title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

WEDNESDAY OCTOBER 30, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

The Moon’s in Sagittarius so you’ll feel physically restless, mentally curious and emotionally excitable. You’re ready for action and adventure, but avoid jumping to hasty, half-baked conclusions.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

Are you stuck in a stultifying Taurus rut? The stars encourage you to be more adventurous as you throw off your comfy slippers and go for it! When it comes to love, take a second look.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

Don’t take relationships for granted today Twins! It’s time to patch up a problem with your spouse, ex-lover, friend, business partner, acquaintance or work colleague. Compromise is the key.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Nurture your body with good food and invigorating exercise today, as the Moon stimulates your wellbeing zone. When it comes to your peer group, things are changing at a rapid rate.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ****

You have a very strong desire to help others today. Plus the Moon boosts your Cat creativity, and helps you feel more positive about your career options and future professional direction.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

You’ll feel restless, as the planets activate your adventurous side. All types of exercise and outdoor activities are favoured, as you channel excess energy into domestic projects or physical pursuits.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ****

The Sagittarian Moon highlights neighbourhood connections and local shenanigans! It’s also a wonderful day to explore fresh personal and professional horizons with an adventurous friend.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

The stars encourage you to find creative ways to make daily chores and routine tasks more enjoyable. You’re also keen to have a deep and meaningful conversation with someone special.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

The Moon moves into your sign today. So you’ll be at your bright and bouncy best – and your blunt and boisterous worst. By all means have fun, but don’t be oblivious to the needs of others.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

Don’t be shy Capricorn! Strive to promote yourself big time, as you push forward personally and professionally. You also have much to gain from sharing creative ideas with compatible colleagues.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

Your bohemian nature shines brightly, as the stars stimulate your endearingly eccentric side. Tap into the adventurous Aquarian you were born to be, as you charm others without even trying.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

It’s a great time to shake off the physical and mental cobwebs. You’re in the mood to be adventurous and get passionate about an exciting new hobby, an online project or a local community connection.

YOUR DAY

The Moon’s in Sagittarius so approach the day in a positive way.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Confident and organised, you like to pay close attention to details. But sometimes you need to step back and look at things from a wider perspective.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
